document.full_text: filming began on monday on the long-awaited "hobbit" movies, ending years of delay due to funding problems and a labor dispute which nearly saw the project shifted out of new zealand.
document.title: filming starts, at last, on much-delayed "hobbit" movie
lines_and_colors: filming began on monday on the long-awaited "hobbit" movies, ending years of delay due to funding problems and a labor dispute which nearly saw the project shifted out of new zealand.
